name: accuweather
description: AccuWeather Plugin for Getting Forecast Data

providerData.description: AccuWeather API Key. Can be obtained by registering at https://developer.accuweather.com/

module.name: Search for City
module.description: Returns an array of all cities matching your search, and their basic information. Includes a "Key" for that city that can be used to get forecast data.

param.description: The name of the city to search for
